name: Designing Digitally
tag_list: second-life, virtual-worlds, virtual-world-company, virtual-world-companies, virtual-learning-company, online-learning, web-based-training, computer-based-training
overview:
As a full service provider of interactive and engaging Virtual World, E-Learning, Simulation, and Web design services, Designing Digitally, Inc. is dedicated to developing creative end to end design solutions for your company or organization. We work alongside you to help overhaul, develop, and/or improve all aspects of your visual communication systems with appealing, professional, interactive designs. With our ability to create professional designs and engaging interactivity, we develop your project efficiently and effectively, from start to finish, all within a timely manner. We strive to provide your business with a prosperous Return on Investment by producing high quality products and providing exceptional services.

Designing Digitally, Inc. will:

Help you identify the skills and tools needed to create an effective project development.

Provide professional development video tutorials on how to use the custom products we develop.

Collaborate with you to design and develop more effective and engaging initiatives.

Designing Digitally, Inc. is also a GSA Schedule 70 & MOBIS contract holder. Our GSA Contract gives all government agencies the opportunity to purchase quality design services at pre-negotiated prices, allowing for an easy transaction.

Interested in our Virtual World, E-Learning, Simulation, or Web design services? Call 1-866-316-9126 to speak to a representative to discuss your interactive project and how Designing Digitally can help you master the digital age! You can view our portfolio by visiting: http://www.designingdigitally.com

milestones.description: Nick Taylor is our Director of Development
